verbs.description: [ARG1: i] [V: ’m] [ARG2: disappointed in national assembly over budget delay] –buhari he said if the national assembly takes seven months to pass a budget then we should be commended for the much that we have achieved and can still achieve lt gen garba duba mr femi adesina mr femi adesina muhammadu buhari national assembly africa presidential villa lt gen garba duba special adviser on media and publicity president sahara reporters abuja niger president muhammadu buhari
